chapter.metadata: You look around and spot the moonlight seeping in from the window. You’re known for sleeping in class, but you’ve never slept in this long. Usually the janitor would at least wake you up, but he hasn’t gotten to this room yet it seems. Wasn’t the first time that a student has been left well past the end of the day. Not a problem.
chapter.text: You look around the large room. ^1500The walls are concrete and tall. ^1500Florescent lights flicker above you. ^1500You look up at them. ^1500Most are burnt out.
